React.js Development

Do you need to create a simple web or mobile app that will offer a zippy, beautiful, native-like user experience?  How do you make sure your app can be built quickly, tested easily, and constructed so that it works equally well in multiple operating environments? For Facebook, the answer was the creation of React.js. 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/contact/” button_text=”Let’s Get Started” _builder_version=”3.19.7″ custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_bg_use_color_gradient=”on” button_bg_color_gradient_start=”#5DE455″ button_bg_color_gradient_end=”#14C0AA” button_bg_color_gradient_direction=”210deg” button_border_width=”0px” button_letter_spacing=”1px” button_font=”|600||on|||||” button_use_icon=”off” custom_margin=”64px||” custom_padding=”20px|72px|20px|72px” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_vertical=”26px” box_shadow_blur=”92px” box_shadow_spread=”3px” box_shadow_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.2)” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”center_left” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ animation_style=”fade” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”|700||on|||||” text_text_color=”#54b454″ text_font_size=”20px” text_letter_spacing=”2.5px” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||8px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

React.js Development

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”||||||||” header_2_font_size=”48px” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

A JavaScript Library Ideal for Interactive User Interfaces

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”4px” _builder_version=”3.19.7″ max_width=”8%” module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” custom_margin=”24px||32px” animation_style=”slide” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”20px” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

React.js can be best described as a JavaScript library solution instead of a full-featured system. It was devised by Facebook as a means of breaking more complex UI (user interface) systems down into smaller, simpler pieces. These smaller pieces are speedily rendered thanks to features such as JSX, a syntax which lets programmers write their programs in either pure JavaScript or a mix of JavaScript, HTML and CSS.

Brightscout can use React.js to construct the user interface (or “view layer”) for your web or mobile app. React.js works beautifully with server-side programming frameworks such as Ruby on Rails. React Native makes the library architecture available to iOS and Android on the native levels. This feature allows us to build your app so that it will work on multiple platforms without having to re-code it using those platforms’ native tools.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_text=”Learn More” button_alignment=”center” module_class=”rv_button closed” _builder_version=”3.19.7″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”14px” button_text_color=”#54B454″ button_bg_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0)” button_border_color=”#54b454″ button_letter_spacing=”1.25px” button_font=”|600|||||||” button_use_icon=”off” custom_margin=”40px||” custom_padding=”16px|40px|16px|40px” animation_style=”zoom” button_text_size_last_edited=”off|desktop” global_colors_info=”{}” button_text_size__hover_enabled=”on” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on” button_bg_color__hover=”#54b454″ button_text_size__hover=”14px” button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on” button_text_color__hover=”#ffffff”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ background_image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/right-bg6.svg” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_right” custom_padding=”58px|0px|20px|0px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Why Choose Brightscout React.js Development?

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row module_class=”dotted-line-divide” _builder_version=”3.25″ module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”29px|0px|80px|0px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}” column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”Beautiful UI for Better UX” image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/01-bg.svg” module_class=”add-shadow” _builder_version=”4.13.0″ header_font=”|600|||||||” background_color=”#ffffff” custom_padding=”24px|24px|24px|24px|true|true” border_radii=”on|6px|6px|6px|6px” border_color_all=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}” background__hover_enabled=”on” background_color__hover=”#ffffff”]

Simplicity

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ header_font=”|300|||||||” header_2_font=”||||||||” header_2_font_size=”48px” custom_margin=”0px||24px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Smaller Components That Yield Big Benefits

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”4px” _builder_version=”3.19.7″ max_width=”12%” height=”0px” animation_style=”slide” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” max_width=”75%” custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]Complexity in a program makes the program harder to check and more vulnerable to bugs. React.js regularly re-uses small components, of which is relatively easy to define and maintain. The result is an app that’s easy to test, manage, and expand on in future versions.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_css_before=”margin: 0px;” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/Screen.png” align=”center” align_tablet=”center” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”3.23″ custom_margin=”-106px||” custom_margin_tablet=”24px||” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left” global_colors_info=”{}” align_phone=”center”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”64px|0px|119px|0px|false|false” animation_style=”fade” global_colors_info=”{}” column_structure=”1_2,1_2″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_css_main_element=”margin: auto auto 0;” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/dribbble-shots.png” align=”center” align_tablet=”center” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”3.23″ custom_margin=”-50px||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right” global_colors_info=”{}” align_phone=”center”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”|700||on|||||” text_text_color=”#54b454″ text_font_size=”20px” text_letter_spacing=”2.5px” custom_margin=”||8px” global_colors_info=”{}”]
